Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Westbound Reroute near Archer/Sacramento
ShortDescription: Westbound 62 Archer buses are temp. rerouted, due to street blockage near Archer/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, California, Pershing, Kedzie, and Archer over normal route: due to, street blockage near Archer/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound Reroute near Devon/Sacramento
ShortDescription: Westbound 155 Devon buses are temp. rerouted via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie, Devon, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie, Devon, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity.

At this time also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
